articles.description: Naveen Jindal's term of appointment as executive director and chairman is due to end on September 30, 2023.
articles.content: Shares of Jindal Steel and Power were trading at Rs 696.35, nearly one percent lower at open on the NSE on September 20. On September 18, it was announced that Chairman Naveen Jindal will continue on… [+1965 chars]

articles.author: Kshitij Anand
articles.title: Stock Radar: Down about 40% from highs! This specialty chemical stock gave a breakout from a falling trend - The Economic Times
articles.description: The stock hit a 52-week high of Rs 844 on September 16, 2022, but it failed to hold on to the momentum. The stock closed at Rs 512 on September 15, 2023, translating into a fall of over 39%.
articles.content: SynopsisThe stock hit a 52-week high of Rs 844 on September 16, 2022, but it failed to hold on to the momentum. The stock closed at Rs 512 on September 15, 2023, translating into a fall of over 39%.
